title: Heimerdinger update (No, no clickbait here)
body: So, the Heimer rework is already on PBE [~~here~~](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ) [here](http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html#balance1) is a full changelist, but simply turret laser has a lot longer CD, but W and E on champions charge it. My idea is that the charge should also work on large and epic monsters (Baron, Drake, Buffs, Skuttle, Gromp, Crimson Raptor etc.). Why? First, with beam charge time of 50 turrets will be a lot less effective for taking down objectives, while this should compensate it. Second, it may make jungle Heimer work, and this is something I really wanna try. I'm Bronze, and this may be some dumb shit, buy actually explain to me, why the heck not?

replies.body:
Jungle heimer will never work in a logical fashion even if he can clear. long turret CD, high mana costs, absolutely no ganking ability or mobility, easily counterjungled.

It would be funny, though.
With 3 start turrets be would able to clear somehow, while solo drake and herald would be easy af, also ERW combo could work for ganking.
This has been announced for 2 weeks now. You're late to the party.
IK, but I just came up with this idea
